descriptions.web/README.md: The given file provides an overview of a collection of APIs and build tools designed to package Widgetry applications as web applications, ensuring ease of use for web developers and seamless interaction for users. Technologies mentioned include JavaScript (with a focus on `import.meta`, supported in browsers from 2018), WebGL (preferably WebGL2, with fallback to WebGL1, supported in common browsers since late 2014), and TypeScript.
descriptions.web/package-lock.json: The given file is a `package-lock.json` for the "widgetry-apps" project, detailing the exact versions of dependencies and their integrity checks to ensure consistent installations across environments. Technologies mentioned include Prettier (version 2.2.1) and TypeScript (version 4.2.3).
descriptions.web/package.json: The given file is a package configuration for a JavaScript project named "widgetry-apps," specifying its author, version, and a script for formatting the source code using Prettier, along with development dependencies for Prettier (version ^2.2.1) and TypeScript (version ^4.2.3).

descriptions.piggyback/README.md:
